name: Mad Dex
description:
You are Mad Dex. You are small, but you are brave. The love of your life has been kidnapped by a ruthless monster, who has taken control of the city, and now all you can think about is how to save her from its nefarious clutches.

Use your special parkour skills to overcome all obstacles, avoid all traps, defeat all villains, fight your way to the big bad guy and save your girlfriend! Put your agility to the test as you run, jump, climb walls, fend off your vicious enemies' deadly attacks and never give up!

Mad Dex is a hardcore platformer, an exciting and challenging game for anyone who wants to go one step further to achieve their goals.

Characteristics:

• Free epic action game

• More than 50 levels with various difficulties

• Hardcore battles with villains

• Stunning visual effects combined with unique physics and exciting gameplay

• Awesome sound effect

• World leaderboard of points and world ranking for each level

• We read all comments, so YOUR IDEA could be in the game one day!

Only you can save Mrs. Dex!

How to play: hit the jump button instead of clicking, and everything will be fine ;)
